data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Junggon, Roca-Cusachs, Marcos, Jung, Sunghoon (2018): Taxonomic review of the genus Urostylis (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Urostylididae) from the Korean Peninsula, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4433 (3): 445-456, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4433.3.3|3 occurrences
